committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To provide reasonable fees to labor representatives that represent nonmember employees.

summary.text: Provides that in cases in which a labor union that serves as an exclusive representative of Federal employees represents a nonmember employee, such employee shall be required to pay such representative a reasonable fee as determined by the Federal Labor Relations Authority.

titles.title: To provide reasonable fees to labor representatives that represent nonmember employees.
